titleStmt.title: A chaine of pearle. Or A memoriall of the peerles graces, and heroick vertues of Queene Elizabeth, of glorious memory. Composed by the noble lady, Diana Primrose
titleStmt.author: Primrose, Diana.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by John Dawson] for Thomas Paine, and are to be sold by Philip Waterhouse, at his shop at the signe of St. Pauls-head in Canning-street neere London-stone,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A chaine of pearle, or A memoriall of Queene Elizabeth.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of St. Pauls-head in Canning-street neere London-stone
